about_the_game:
Don't forget to Wishlist it now!

Embark on a thrilling 2D puzzle platformer and discover the secrets of a mysterious underground cave.
The game has more than 60 levels with nice graphics and a good soundtrack
Every level presents a unique puzzle to solve,
Pushing your intelligence and problem-solving skills to the limit.
The game supports controllers but keyboard needed for some typing-based puzzles.
Do you have what it takes to uncover the secrets of the cave and solve every puzzle in your path?
detailed_description:

name: Precision of insight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB video memory, support OpenGL
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB video memory or higher, support OpenGL

short_description: 2D puzzle platformer with a lot of puzzles that will push your intelligence and problem-solving skills to the limit.
supported_languages:
English*, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
